seller_description: Material Stainless Steel, Color Set/Black, Product Dimensions 2.5'W x 7.9'H, Brand Sweet Alice, Item Weight 689 Grams, Operation Mode Automatic, Recommended Uses For Product Restaurant, Party, Picnic, Kitchen, Home, Camping, Is Dishwasher Safe No, UPC 793513797061, See more. About this item: Automatic Operation Our Electric Pepper and Salt Grinder with Gravity sensor switch, you even needn't to press a button, Simply flipped the grinder and you will have fresh ground spices, Convenient and funny. Battery powered, each grinder requires 6 AAA batteries (batteries not included, Please prepare batteries in advance). Adjustable Grinder Many grinding levels for your choice allows you to grinder your spices from coarse to fine. Electric Pepper and Salt Grinder use a high-quality ceramic rotor. You can choose the coarseness of your spice, salt or pepper by turning adjustment knob at the head of the grinder. Wide Applicability The electric grinder is suitable for pepper, salt and other solid grain seasonings. Battery powered, convenient and fast, you can use it anytime and anywhere. This grinder is the good helper for kitchens, restaurants, parties and outdoor picnics. Unique Design Transparent acrylic material at the bottom allows you to see the remaining spices and convenient to distinguish the spices in the grinder. Turn the bottom container clockwise to open it. Turn the bottom container counterclockwise to close it. When closing, do not over-tighten it, otherwise it will require a lot of force to open it again. With the blue LED light, blue light is not only bright but also gentle, you can easily to see amount of pepper, salt and other grain you put in your food. 200  Quality   Money Back 100 days free replacement   money back if any dissatisfaction. If you find that the mill does not work after the product arrives , it is generally the case that the ceramic grinding core is stuck with granules. In this case, first turn the coarseness adjustment button on the top of the grinder in a counterclockwise direction and adjust it to the coarsest state. Then use tweezers to remove the particles blocking the ceramic grinding core. And then the grinder can grind normally.
review: We didn't have high hopes for this purchase. They are not only stylish but functional. But definitely a purchase that was worth it. For the price point they exceeded our expectations.
expected-output: The seller's description presents a product that is both stylish and functional. The electric grinders are promoted with an automatic gravity sensor that activates grinding by simply tilting the device, eliminating the need to press any buttons. It emphasizes adjustable coarseness, a high-quality ceramic rotor, and an LED light for visibility while grinding. The description asserts that the grinder is suitable for various settings and is battery-operated, offering convenience for both home and outdoor use. Furthermore, a 100-day free replacement or money-back guarantee is highlighted, ensuring satisfaction and quick replacement if issues arise. The buyer’s review reflects mixed sentiments. The user expresses satisfaction with the pepper grinder, appreciating its ease of use and stylish design. However, they report ongoing issues with the salt grinder, stating it never functioned consistently. Upon investigation, the buyer found that the internal grinding mechanism was broken, rendering the salt grinder non-functional. The buyer’s disappointment is evident, as they expected both grinders to work as reliably as the pepper grinder. The seller's images depict a well-crafted, sleek pair of grinders that visually match the physical product received by the buyer, as shown in their images. The aesthetic and form factor align well between the promotional and user-provided photos. However, the breakdown of the salt grinder’s internal mechanism, as shown in the buyer’s image of the broken ceramic components, highlights a potential quality issue not indicated in the seller’s claims. Conclusion: There is a clear discrepancy between the product description and the buyer’s experience, specifically with the reliability of the salt grinder. While the pepper grinder functions as expected, the failure of the salt grinder’s mechanism suggests potential quality control issues. Although the seller offers a satisfaction guarantee, this failure detracts from the overall value, especially as the product is marketed as a set. The buyer’s review indicates dissatisfaction due to the inconsistency in functionality, specifically with one grinder working well and the other failing. This analysis suggests that while the product may meet aesthetic and some functional expectations, it falls short in consistent quality across both units in the set. The fault lies with the seller, as the salt grinder’s malfunction indicates a potential quality control issue. The seller advertised both grinders as fully functional, but the buyer experienced issues with the salt grinder’s internal mechanism, which did not meet the advertised reliability. Although the pepper grinder met expectations, the inconsistency within the set detracts from the product's overall value and alignment with the seller’s promises.
label: 1:Here buyer agreed with the seller
